cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 110 mi SE of Isla Beata, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: moving WNW across the Caribbean Sea, forecast to turn northwest toward Jamaica, Cuba and then the Florida Straits before curving toward the U.S. Southeast coast late in the 5-day period

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and tropical-storm watches confined to portions of Cuba; no watches north of Florida at this time
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings along south coast of Hispaniola and Jamaica; no warnings north of Cuba
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Caribbean islands, south‐central Cuba, Florida Peninsula/Keys and eventually the U.S. Southeast coastline (FL–SC) late period
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds unlikely; probabilities remain below 5% through 5 days
weather_observation.rainfall: No significant rainfall forecast for New York, NY & NJ through 5 days
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated in the current forecast window
